column4: the brightness of my sony vaio is killing me... and there's no way for me to reduce it.. i've tried so many things.. none seemed to work... anyone has any ideas? (SONY VAIO VGN-FE38GP)

reduce the value....

what graphic card is that?
geforce 7600 go
Do you have nvidia settings...

nvidia-gls
nvidia-glx

thx...
